Phone: 828-262-0020

url: qualityinnboone.com

services: Quality Inn Appalachian Conference Center has over 5600 square feet of flexible meeting and exhibit space. Nestled in the cool western mountains of North Carolina we offer the perfect location for your next convention or corporate event. For a limited time we are offering our meeting space free of charge with a minimum of 30 rooms booked for two nights Sunday through Thursday. This can result in a savings of over $900.00 a day. Ask about our new year round "Corporate Care Program" for repeat business.

comments: Quality Inn Appalachian Conference Center has recently undergone a $1.5 Million Dollar renovation. We also have an onsite restaurant, The Bourbon Street Grille and Tavern. The Madrid Theatre retains unique architectural features such as the romantic Spanish Revival style facade and carved angels in the original ceiling. On-site coordinating, a gracious staff and a full-service bar are just some of the amenities available.
